item.title: Youtube Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Hi there,

I'm currently looking for a talented video editor to join our team on a recurring project basis. We can provide up to 7 YouTube videos per month, primarily focused on vlogs and challenges. These videos are typically less than 30 minutes of raw footage and are not very complicated.

Requirements:

- Proven experience in video editing
- Familiarity with editing for YouTube
- Experience in editing content for the couple niche, family channel, and vlogs is a plus
- Ability to meet deadlines and communicate effectively

If this opportunity interests you, please submit previous samples of your past Youtube Video projects. I’d love to set up a quick meeting to discuss the details further. Thanks again.

Hourly Range: $33.00-$55.00
Posted On: June 29, 2024 20:53 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, YouTube
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, YouTube
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: On-Camera Video Task - $70 - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for someone who’s not camera shy to help with a quick video task. No video editing required!

Pay:
$70 for a short video task

Requirements:

Comfortable being on camera
Reliable and punctual

Budget: $70
Posted On: June 29, 2024 20:22 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Production, Videography, Video Commercial, Explainer Video, Digital Video, Camera, Acting, Video Intro & Outro
Skills: Video Production, Videography, Video Commercial, Explainer Video, Digital Video, Camera, Acting, Video Intro & Outro
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
